sections.heading: Repealed.Section 22-4A-2 - Repealed.Section 22-4A-3 - Repealed.
sections.text:
History:Laws 1987, ch. 191, § 1; repealed by Laws 2019, ch. 212, § 284.

Repeals.— Laws 2019, ch. 212, § 284 repealed 22-4A-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1987, ch. 191, § 1, relating to short title, effective April 3, 2019. For provisions of former section,seethe 2018 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.
